data.value: The host system belongs to the server version.

data.name: drivererror
data.value: Driver injection failed. Please check if BitLocker is enabled on the system drive or if the Windows directory is missing.

data.name: servererror
data.value: The host system is not a server version, and the virtual machine with the PCIe Passthrough device added will not be able to start!

data.name: Error_CannotParseMmioSpace
data.value: Failed to parse MMIO space properties.

data.name: Warning_LowMmioSpace_ConfirmExpand
data.value:
The MMIO space for virtual machine '{0}' is currently {1}GB, which is below the recommended 64GB.
This may prevent the graphics card from acquiring enough memory space.
Do you want to shut down the virtual machine and expand its MMIO space to 64GB?

data.name: Error_GetNetworkInfoFailed
data.value: Failed to get network information. Please ensure the program is run with administrator privileges and the Hyper-V module is installed.

data.name: Error_ExternalSwitchRequiresPhysicalAdapter
data.value: A physical network adapter must be specified for an external switch.

data.name: AddSwitch_Validation_NoAdaptersForExternalOrNat
data.value: Cannot create an External or NAT switch because no physical network adapters are available.

data.name: AddSwitch_Validation_AdapterRequiredForExternalOrNat
data.value: An External or NAT switch must have a physical network adapter selected.

data.name: AddSwitch_Validation_OnlyOneNatAllowed
data.value: The system allows only one user-created NAT network.

data.name: Info_BiosIommuEnabled
data.value: IOMMU is enabled in the BIOS.

data.name: Error_BiosIommuDisabled
data.value: IOMMU is not enabled in the BIOS. DDA and GPU-PV are unavailable.

data.name: Description_HyperVRfScheduler
data.value: Hyper-V VM Turbo Scheduler, created and managed by the ExhyperV application.

data.name: Warning_CannotModifyDefaultSwitch
data.value: This is a default switch and its settings cannot be modified.

data.name: Info_NoSwitchesFound
data.value:
No Hyper-V virtual switches were found.
Please ensure the Hyper-V feature is installed and running.

data.name: Error_OnlyOneNatNetworkAllowed
data.value:
Operation failed: Only one NAT network is allowed.
The existing NAT switch is: '{0}'

data.name: Error_PhysicalAdapterInUse
data.value: Operation failed: The physical network adapter '{0}' is already in use by the switch '{1}'.

data.name: Error_UpdateSwitchConfigFailed
data.value: Failed to update configuration for switch '{0}': {1}

data.name: Description_HyperVAutoTurbo
data.value: Changes the power mode to High Performance when the VM is under high load, and to Power Saver during low load.

data.name: Description_StartupRAM
data.value: Specifies the initial amount of memory required to start this virtual machine.

data.name: Description_MemoryWeight
data.value: The priority for obtaining memory when the host is low on memory.

data.name: Description_MinimumRAM
data.value: The minimum memory the virtual machine can shrink to.

data.name: Description_MaximumRAM
data.value: The maximum memory the virtual machine can expand to.

data.name: StartupRamLessThanMinRam
data.value: Startup RAM cannot be less than Minimum RAM.

data.name: MinRamGreaterThanMaxRam
data.value: Minimum RAM cannot be greater than Maximum RAM.

data.name: Error_VmHardDiskNotFound
data.value: Could not find the virtual hard disk file for virtual machine '{0}'.

data.value: Failed to mount the virtual disk or get its disk number.

data.name: Error_AdminRequiredForPartitionInfo
data.value: Reading disk partition information requires administrator privileges. Please restart the application as an administrator.

data.name: Error_InvalidWindowsPartition
data.value: The selected partition (Number: {0}, mounted as {1}) does not appear to be a valid Windows system partition. The required path '{2}' was not found, or the partition is encrypted with Bitlocker.

data.value: Error: Virtual machine '{0}' must be in the 'Off' state.

data.value: Error: Failed to get the virtual machine's hard disk path for driver injection.

[FATAL EXCEPTION]

data.name: Warning_Win10GpuAssignmentNotPersistent
data.value:
When using Windows 10 as the host, the assigned GPU partition is only effective for the current session.
To ensure the virtual machine uses the same GPU on the next cold boot, you must either manually disable other GPUs first, or re-assign it using this tool.

data.value: Could not find the embedded WPF resource.

data.value: Failed to check for updates. Please check your network connection.

data.value: Error: No recognizable Windows or Linux partitions were found on this virtual disk.

data.value: You are already using the latest version.

data.name: Log_UserRetryingDeployment
data.value: User selected retry, re-executing deployment script...

data.value: To assign a GPU to this virtual machine, it must be in the 'Off' state.

data.name: Confirm_ShutdownMessage
data.value:
The virtual machine "{0}" is currently running.
To proceed with the GPU assignment, this virtual machine needs to be shut down.
Selecting "Shutdown and Continue" will perform a forced shutdown (equivalent to unplugging the power cord).

data.value: Host IP address cannot be empty.

data.value: Proxy IP and Port must be either both filled or both empty.

data.value: CPU pinning cannot be set when using the root scheduler and the VM is not running.

data.name: SelectHostCpuCoresToBind
data.value: Select the host processor cores to bind to this virtual machine (Click and drag to select):

data.name: ClassicSchedulerDescription
data.value: Classic Scheduler: Optimized for performance using fair, time-sliced scheduling.

data.name: CoreSchedulerDescription
data.value: Core Scheduler: Increases security by isolating VMs on dedicated physical cores.

data.name: RootSchedulerDescription
data.value: Root Scheduler: Lets the host OS manage scheduling; disables manual VM resource controls.

data.name: AllowNumaSpanningDescription
data.value: Enables cross-NUMA memory access. Warning: Disabling may affect CPU oversubscription on Server 2025.

data.name: VMSettingsSavedSuccessfully
data.value: Settings for virtual machine '{0}' saved successfully.

data.value: IDE controller does not support hot-swapping while the VM is running.

data.name: Storage_Error_DvdHotRemoveNotSupported
data.value: Cannot remove empty optical drive while the VM is running. Only eject is supported.

data.value: File name is too long (exceeds 64 characters).

data.value: A single file exceeds the 4GB size limit.

data.value: Relative path within the ISO is too long (exceeds 240 characters).
